languages.text: {n}Кибермастиф бросается на главаря бандитов: железные челюсти перемалывают мясо и кости как лопасти огромной мясорубки, вы не успеваете даже уследить за перемещениями зверя. Спустя секунды на месте угрожавшего вам человека остается изуродованный труп, а его более удачливые приспешники в ужасе уносят ноги.{/n}
languages.translation_comment: Если сыграл этюд FW_ShakedPlanks. Глейто отгрызает всем лицо сам остается целым
Если сыграл этюд FW_ShakedPlanks. Глейто отгрызает всем лицо сам остается целым

languages.text: {n}The cyber-mastiff lunges at the leader of the bandits — his metal jaws start mincing flesh and bone like the knives of a giant meat grinder, moving faster than your eyes can even follow. Within seconds, the man who threatened you is a mutilated corpse, and his more fortunate henchmen are fleeing in terror.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Кибермастиф бросается на главаря бандитов: железные челюсти перемалывают мясо и кости как лопасти огромной мясорубки, вы не успеваете даже уследить за перемещениями зверя. Спустя секунды на месте угрожавшего вам человека остается изуродованный труп, а его более удачливые приспешники в ужасе уносят ноги.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The cyber-mastiff lunges at the leader of the bandits — his metal jaws start mincing flesh and bone like the knives of a giant meat grinder, moving faster than your eyes can even follow. Within seconds, the man who threatened you is a mutilated corpse, and his more fortunate henchmen are fleeing in terror.{/n}

{n}The cyber-mastiff lunges at the bandits, moving with impossible speed, its metal jaws mincing flesh and bone like the knives of a giant meat grinder. It takes Glaito seconds to litter the ground with corpses, and those bandits who can still walk scramble away with fewer limbs than before.{/n}

{n}The cyber-mastiff lunges at the leader of the bandits — his metal jaws start mincing flesh and bone like the knives of a giant meat grinder, moving faster than your eyes can even follow. Within seconds, the man who threatened you is a mutilated corpse, and his more fortunate henchmen are fleeing in terror.{/n}

{n}Moving with impossible speed, the cyber-mastiff lunges at the bandits, its metal jaws mincing flesh and bone like the knives of a giant meat grinder. It takes Glaito just seconds to litter the ground with corpses, and those bandits who can still walk scramble away with fewer limbs than before.{/n}

Within seconds, the man who threatened you is a mutilated corpse, and his more fortunate henchmen are fleeing in terror.{/n}

Within seconds, the man who threatened you is a mutilated corpse, and his more fortunate henchmen are fleeing in terror.{/n}

{n}The cyber-mastiff lunges at the leader of the bandits — his metal jaws start mincing flesh and bone like the knives of a giant meat grinder, moving faster than your eyes can even follow. Within seconds, the man who threatened you is a mutilated corpse, and his more fortunate henchmen are fleeing in terror.{/n}

languages.text: {n}格雷托猛地扑向了土匪头领，金属颚仿佛巨型绞肉机的刀片一样，轻而易举地撕裂了筋肉和骨头，动作快得让你眼花缭乱。仅仅过了几秒，那个刚刚还在威胁你的人，就变成了一堆残缺不全的碎肉。至于那些运气比较好的喽啰，立刻惊恐地逃之夭夭 。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cyber-mastiff lunges at the leader of the bandits — his metal jaws start mincing flesh and bone like the knives of a giant meat grinder, moving faster than your eyes can even follow. Within seconds, the man who threatened you is a mutilated corpse, and his more fortunate henchmen are fleeing in terror.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}格雷托猛地扑向了土匪头领，金属颚仿佛巨型绞肉机的刀片一样，轻而易举地撕裂了筋肉和骨头，动作快得让你眼花缭乱。仅仅过了几秒，那个刚刚还在威胁你的人，就变成了一堆残缺不全的碎肉。至于那些运气比较好的喽啰，立刻惊恐地逃之夭夭 。{/n}

languages.text: {n}サイバーマスチフは盗賊のリーダーに飛びかかった。その金属の顎は、あなたの目では追いきれないほどの速さで動き、巨大な肉挽き機の刃のように肉と骨を切り刻んだ。数秒のうちに、あなたを脅していた男は無残な死体となり、運の良い手下たちは恐怖に駆られて逃げ出していった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cyber-mastiff lunges at the leader of the bandits — his metal jaws start mincing flesh and bone like the knives of a giant meat grinder, moving faster than your eyes can even follow. Within seconds, the man who threatened you is a mutilated corpse, and his more fortunate henchmen are fleeing in terror.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}サイバーマスチフは盗賊のリーダーに飛びかかった。その金属の顎は、あなたの目では追いきれないほどの速さで動き、巨大な肉挽き機の刃のように肉と骨を切り刻んだ。数秒のうちに、あなたを脅していた男は無残な死体となり、運の良い手下たちは恐怖に駆られて逃げ出していった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El cibermastín se abalanza sobre el líder de los bandidos: sus fauces de metal trituran carne y hueso como las cuchillas de una picadora de carne gigante, moviéndose tan deprisa que apenas puedes verlas. En cuestión de segundos, el hombre que te amenazaba es un cadáver mutilado y sus secuaces, más afortunados que él, huyen despavoridos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cyber-mastiff lunges at the leader of the bandits — his metal jaws start mincing flesh and bone like the knives of a giant meat grinder, moving faster than your eyes can even follow. Within seconds, the man who threatened you is a mutilated corpse, and his more fortunate henchmen are fleeing in terror.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El cibermastín se abalanza sobre el líder de los bandidos: sus fauces de metal trituran carne y hueso como las cuchillas de una picadora de carne gigante, moviéndose tan deprisa que apenas puedes verlas. En cuestión de segundos, el hombre que te amenazaba es un cadáver mutilado y sus secuaces, más afortunados que él, huyen despavoridos.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Siber mastif, haydut liderinin üzerine atılıyor. Metal çeneleri, dev bir kıyma makinesinin bıçakları gibi etle kemiği parçalıyor ve gözlerinin bile takip edemeyeceği bir hızla hareket ediyor. Seni tehdit eden adam, saniyeler içinde bir cesede dönüşüyor. Daha şanslı olan adamları ise dehşet içinde kaçışıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cyber-mastiff lunges at the leader of the bandits — his metal jaws start mincing flesh and bone like the knives of a giant meat grinder, moving faster than your eyes can even follow. Within seconds, the man who threatened you is a mutilated corpse, and his more fortunate henchmen are fleeing in terror.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Siber mastif, haydut liderinin üzerine atılıyor. Metal çeneleri, dev bir kıyma makinesinin bıçakları gibi etle kemiği parçalıyor ve gözlerinin bile takip edemeyeceği bir hızla hareket ediyor. Seni tehdit eden adam, saniyeler içinde bir cesede dönüşüyor. Daha şanslı olan adamları ise dehşet içinde kaçışıyor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le cyber-mastiff se jette sur le chef des bandits. Ses mâchoires métalliques déchirent les chairs et broient les os comme les lames d'un hachoir à viande géant, s'activant à une vitesse impossible. En quelques secondes à peine, l'homme qui vous menaçait n'est plus que de la charpie, et ses acolytes les plus chanceux prennent leurs jambes à leur cou.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cyber-mastiff lunges at the leader of the bandits — his metal jaws start mincing flesh and bone like the knives of a giant meat grinder, moving faster than your eyes can even follow. Within seconds, the man who threatened you is a mutilated corpse, and his more fortunate henchmen are fleeing in terror.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le cyber-mastiff se jette sur le chef des bandits. Ses mâchoires métalliques déchirent les chairs et broient les os comme les lames d'un hachoir à viande géant, s'activant à une vitesse impossible. En quelques secondes à peine, l'homme qui vous menaçait n'est plus que de la charpie, et ses acolytes les plus chanceux prennent leurs jambes à leur cou.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Cyber-Mastiff stürzt sich auf den Anführer der Banditen – seine metallenen Kiefer durchtrennen Fleisch und Knochen wie die Messer eines riesigen Fleischwolfs, schneller, als du mit den Augen folgen kannst. Binnen Sekunden ist der Mann, der dich bedroht hat, eine verstümmelte Leiche. Seine Schergen haben mehr Glück und fliehen verängstigt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cyber-mastiff lunges at the leader of the bandits — his metal jaws start mincing flesh and bone like the knives of a giant meat grinder, moving faster than your eyes can even follow. Within seconds, the man who threatened you is a mutilated corpse, and his more fortunate henchmen are fleeing in terror.{/n}
